items.summary: Update the global background CSS in `frontend/src/index.css` so the `body` background uses `background-size: 100% auto` or `background-size: auto 100%` (instead of `contain`) to test which option yields better alignment/visibility for the full background image, while keeping the existing background image asset references, `background-repeat: no-repeat`, and current positioning unless changes are required for the new sizing mode.
